website_summaries.verdict: These budget-friendly, bass-heavy workout headphones are ideal for any workout in any conditions.
pros: Completely waterproof against sweat and weather, and can even be cleaned with water
They offer up to 18 hours of listening per charge, plus they come with various sized ear tips and wings
cons: Not as durable and long-lasting as other models

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: I finally had tested these things out today and they are wonderful. The sound quality is fantastic! These are a little odd shaped compared to the ones I usually use. These earbuds come with three different sizes of covers, perfect for those of us with smaller ears. These earbuds are super comfortable to wear. I like that the plug is at a 90 degree angle; I'm hoping that will help with the life since I use them with my phone and an armband at the gym. It seems like this would put less stress on the connection, but only time will tell. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: TxSunshine

customer_reviews.title: BANG for the Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I will buy these things for as long as they are being sold. Jlab has a great replacement warranty on their products. These are such a lightweight deign that I thought they would break at the first moment of tension on the line. On the contrary, these little buds are more durable than any others I have tried. The microphone is clear and the sound is incredible. The guards they give you make it so that these almost never fall out, even during and intense workout. Great little pair of headphones that would make a great stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna R.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They sound okay, and the bass is present, but it's not as strong as I figured it would be. The treble is almost too strong. The mids are clear. EDIT: I added one more star - went from 3 to 4 stars. I believe I spoke too soon previously. The earbuds just needed time to break in. They currently sound really good. The bass is moderate still but more present than before, the mids are very clear, and the highs are no longer too strong, just nice and crisp without being shrill.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds at such a price like this!!??!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I needed a new pair of wired earbuds. I didn't want to pay tons of money. I saw these and they looked quality for the price. $10 can't be beat. They have a mic on the right ear cord. I can plug these right into my ps4 controller and play and communicate while letting my ears get some much need breathing room! The sound quality is impressive, I must say. I can hear the bass and the treble. I use the for play on ps4, watching stuff on my ps4, and for my kindle. I recommend them for people on budget.
customer_reviews.author: jbay

customer_reviews.title: These are fine if you're on a budget and not an audiophile.
customer_reviews.text: These fit me well right out of the bag. When I plugged the earbuds into my Ipod I heard a little bit of static. So I turned the audio jack and then the static was gone. The vocals sound more flat than the earbuds I was using before which were the ones that came with my Samsung Galaxy S6 phone. I prefer those for audio quality but for comfort and build quality I prefer the JBuds. These are fine for Rock and Metal but I'm going to look for something slightly better. I only bought these because I forgot to register the a-audio earbuds for the warranty and I wanted to give this company a try.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: The mic when using it for phone calls is good, noise cancelling depends on your phone
customer_reviews.text: Comparable to skull candy. EQ on this is a bit flat, nothing that your phone eq can't fix. The mic when using it for phone calls is good, noise cancelling depends on your phone. For me it's too sensitive in my work environment. Still would pick it up for what it's worth. It has great bass if you're a bass type of person.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gallardes

customer_reviews.title: Tough little things.
customer_reviews.text: It's been about 2 years since I've bought my pair and they've been through a lot. Numerous trips, bus rides, runs, tossed about in bags and pockets, and still working as fine as the first day I've got them. I've actually left them in my pants pocket and they've been though the wash, twice. For the price the sound is respectable, but the value really comes from the durability of these things. I can't tell you how many pairs of earbuds that have just stopped working no matter how careful I am with them. I wouldn't say these are 100% idiot proof, but they'll hold up with an active lifestyle or in the hands of a child.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fit, Great sound, Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've use these every night to listen to podcasts or iBooks in bed. I fall asleep with them in my ears and wake up with them still in place. They are comfortable. The flat wing piece fits nicely inside my ear and helps to keep the ear bud in position. I often wear only the left ear bud upside down in my right ear - to sleep on my left side. The cable and my device stay away from my face and neck. These work well for me. In nightly use since Nov 2018 - 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: V. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best sounding ear buds ive ever heard for the money. Bass is great with a good seal yet you can still hear everything out side if you need to. Ive had them die on me in a year but its worth it for 10 dollars and the company will send you a new pair for free. These sound so good i sometimes choose them over much more expensive westone and KZ headphones, they are pretty amazing for the price. Not fatiguing, good bass and treble, over all great sound. I do use a headphone amp sometimes and i have a 5 balanced driver westone so i know what good sounding is.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed - Can't recommend enough!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always a little shy about buying ear buds online. I seem to have exceptionally small ears, and even the smallest rubber ear piece, is always too big. Or, they get ruined pretty easy in my house, where it's all boys - even if I buy pink to keep them away! That being said, I've had them for a year now! I use them at the gym, when I'm walking the public parks, and even just to watch a movie on my cell, or listen to music. They're pretty sturdy, the sound is actually really good, and I literally throw them in a purse, backpack, etc. Very impressed, won't be getting any other ear buds again!
customer_reviews.author: JandDsmom08

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely great for the price!! cant regret my money. all the extra piece though i don't know how to use the cushion fittings.the angle for the headphone jack bring durability to life because it doesn't bend when it is in your pocket.The sound it excellent drains adequate amount of outside sound out but not to much, base is quite acceptable compared to many other pricey headphone. thought it lack the volume adjustments i can deal. A pair with those upgrades would be everything.
customer_reviews.author: Leander

customer_reviews.title: Good deal - good price/quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace some Jlabs I got with a phone. They're a good replacement! I can't speak for the noise cancelling bc I haven't used them in a noisy environment. But, the sound is nice (balanced, not too quiet, bass is there but not overpowering) and they stay in well enough to work out. Pluses are the different covers it comes with and the built in mic. For the price they're worth it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first set of earphones of any kind and actually using them, so I can't judge what is a good set of phones/buds or what is not. But all I can say is that these work well. I can hear music through them which is saying a lot because I can barely hear anything from deafness. I bought these specifically for listening to brainwave entrainment tracks on my Kindle Fire, and I can hear it. Though with my cochlear implant I find that the sound of the fan drowns out a lot of the sound. Which isn't a fault of the earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: CB Twelve

customer_reviews.title: From a repeat J-Budder...Great sound but these J2s fit awkwardly.
customer_reviews.text: These J2s are good but are a bit more awkwardly designed than the numerous models of J-Buds I've had. The sound is very good but these just don't sit in my ears as comfortably. I am fairly certain the anatomy of my ears is like most everyone elses so if you like a snug fit, I would recommend getting another J-Bud model instead since the angle of the earpiece does not sit as securely and comfortably as their other designs. That is kind of subjective so if you like that type of design do not hesitate to buy because the sound and durability, as usual with J-Buds, is terrific for the price.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: They don't tangle easily, the cord is long
customer_reviews.text: They don't tangle easily, the cord is long, they sound fine, and they stay in well. That's pretty much all I ask. Like all earbuds, they can make my ears sore after a couple hours of use, but I still prefer earbuds to big, bulky headphones for podcasts and audiobooks while I'm at work. I like to use one at a time so I can hear coworkers when they talk to me. This helps with soreness because I can switch ears throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: SML

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working in one week. I bought these for my 15 year old daughter, they did cancel out the noise, and this is her second pair, the first pair lasted over a year. This pair, one side stopped working within the first week. I had to order an entirely new pair and brand. I won't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: kdugg2020

customer_reviews.title: these are great, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: these are great, especially for the price. I run 1-2 times a week and these have held up and have good sound quality. I love these because they actually stay in my ear while im running!!!! I also have a wireless pair for my new iphone and the quality of those are just as great. I def recommend these for people who dont want to invest in an expensive pair quite yet!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Recieved the wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and recieved one single earbud.... very disappointed I thought I just didnt read or look at the description, but now that i looked through my order history I know they messed up and sent me the wrong thing.... it's pretty good sound but I have two ears and a single ear bud is kinda useless for me
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nunez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND BUT POOR CONNECTION OVER TIME.
customer_reviews.text: Great Buds. I have had several pair however the only downside is that after a year or so the male connection that fits into the Ipod gets intermittent. Tried cleaning them but no go. I think it's the fine wire or rubber angle. Wish they would fix this ongoing problem. I'm a retiree so I am real easy on them. No jogging for me. Thhy offer a great guarantee however it's easier for me to just purchase another pair. The earbud angle is also great.
customer_reviews.author: RKelly

customer_reviews.title: These have quality sound...perfect for small ears. Does not have mic or volume control.
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds have quality sound. I like the angled plug and that the earbuds themselves are angled. I was a little leary of the earbuds being angled, but I really like feature. I have very small ear canals, and the small tips included are a perfect fit. It doesn't hurt that the price was a great as well! The only thing I'm disappointed with is that...there isn't a mic or volume control on the wire. That is something that I'm sure I overlooked. That is a must for me, so I am going to return them...otherwise I would be keeping them and would be well satisfied. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: DL 0f SC

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't tell you
customer_reviews.text: I did a search for wireless earbuds these popped up I didn’t pay attention to the fact it didn’t actually say wireless and purchase them well now I have earbuds I can’t use because well I have a phone that can’t except wired. I don’t know why they showed up in a wireless search. So I can’t tell you how good these are or how bad they are because well I can’t dry them.
customer_reviews.author: kaldiva

customer_reviews.title: Average but comfy
customer_reviews.text: I think the fit is ok. The sound is bery trebleish..as in high with not a lot of bass balance when listening to music. I bougjy them to be on zoom meetings though mostly. They are average. I gave an extra star for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kassia C

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones
customer_reviews.text: These have doubled in price since I last used them but they’re still really good for the money I usually buy about three or four of them and just dispose of them when they break or I step on them or something like that
customer_reviews.author: Super Dad

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3; one didn't even come in the standard packaging like it was refurbished. Started using the earbud and if the plug was bumped Siri would come up or my music would just stop, or it would speed up. So I thought it was a problem with the one not in the standard packaging. Ripped open a new one and I'm experiencing the same issues with this one. These replaced a pair that wore out and I'm sorry I didn't stick with the version I had before. These are just cheap.
customer_reviews.author: RicF964

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a right-angle pair of headphones for my tablet and when i saw the price on these i decided to give them a shot. I am not disappointed! They sound fine and are comfortable too. They might not have the bass depth of a pair of $70 sony buds, but they sound very clear and I was pleasantly surprised, considering their price. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: I own several pair of these. I often use them under a motorcycle helmet on a loud cruiser motorcycle. Though these are not billed as noise-reducing ear buds, they effectively blocked noise. The sound quality is superb and it is very hard to believe that they came at such a low price. I have used one pair heavily over the last year and it still works as good as the first day. The variety of silicone tips makes it easy to get a perfect fit. This is an awesome value on an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Law Dog

customer_reviews.title: but these were not of the best quality for me
customer_reviews.text: I am a big JLab fan, but these were not of the best quality for me.... The sound quality was typical JLab... good bass even without burning them but the left earbud's sound was faint & sounded as if the sound was intermittent.... The cord was rather thin too and because of this issues, I can't comment on the mic portion of these buds. I will be sending these back and looking to get a better quality pair of JLab earbuds to serve as backup to my Sennheiser Momentum's which I need replacement earbud tips.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN D MILLIGAN

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, low profile in the ear, "L" bend on the jack for less wear. Sound quality is adequate for audiobooks & phone calls - my primary uses. Good enough for casual music listening - would probably not satisfy a perfectionistic audiophile. One complaint - the single button control should only trigger play/pause to my thinking. Unfortunately it triggers stupid Siri about 1/4 of the time. And "Shut up and play my book" is beyond her comprehension.
customer_reviews.author: Irishlazz

customer_reviews.title: Nice buds for low cost.
customer_reviews.text: These buds pack major; clear sound. I didnt notice they didn't have a mic before i bought them but the sound is so good. I don't care! Lol. Great product. Im rough on earphones so i will post update in a few weeks. I have had more expensive buds and the sound doesn't come through like these. I also have hearing issues lol but these give me the sound quality i need. I purchased them with my own money so here is feedback that you can believe.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Crown

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these, for me they last long and I don't have many issues, I accidently sent a pair through the washer and dryer once and surprisingly they still worked pretty well. For $10 earbuds they are great and definitely better than any other I've had before
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good earbuds, but sound wise aren't phenomenal.
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice earbuds. The sound quality is good but nothing to write home about. The bass is adequate, but isn't going to blow your mind. These are great earbuds for the price, but not necessarily the best ones you can get. The main appeal for this to me was the color options (I ordered purple) and the shape.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Earbud wires more fragile than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds look beautiful and fit perfectly. I have a Roku upstairs and downstairs, and decided to be nice to my neighbor and stop the noise. I thought this was a match to the earbuds that came with my last Roku. It is not. After a few days, I can hear noise that means one of the wires is not connecting as it should. I live alone, so it's just me using these. My Roku earbuds are several months old and I have no problem with them. I won't be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite regardless of price paid
customer_reviews.text: My favorite regardless of price paid. I have like 6 of these now tucked away wherever I might need them for conference calls, running, sitting on an airplane, etc. It's not for audiophiles listening to music but it gets the job done OK sound-wise and is great on comfort and on microphone quality.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I only wore these for 30 seconds or so. I had to return (it was my error as I thought they were Bluetooth) but for that short time, I could tell they were very well made and would serve my purpose so much that I ordered the Bluetooth version.
customer_reviews.author: robert edwards

customer_reviews.title: Just arrived today and really love it. Each earpiece is designed for a right ...
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today and really love it. Each earpiece is designed for a right or left ear. They were very comfortable fitting in my ear. It came with an extra pair earbuds for the ear. The sound is incredible and I liked that when off you could hear the television or a person clearly w them in. So much better fitting and functional than the ones that came w my iPhone 6s.
customer_reviews.author: chris2011

customer_reviews.title: If I press them into my ears the sound quality is great - but I don't have 2 extra hands to ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me but none of ear pieces fit my ears - not even close. If I press them into my ears the sound quality is great - but I don't have 2 extra hands to do this while I'm doing other things. Have experimented with Comply foam with some success. Does anybody offer a custom molded insert? I'd pay.
customer_reviews.author: R. Betters

customer_reviews.title: Had a small problem with one side volume being extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a small problem with one side volume being extremely low, turns out earwax builds up on the mesh filter inside the earbud and blocks the sound. Cleaned the earbud (and my ears) with a pin and solved the issue by removing the mesh filter. Otherwise works well as a cheap around the office earbud.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: They do the job. What's odd, and we haven't quite figured out, is why the earbuds are not symmetrical. One has an odd plastic flap on it. There is also no clear indication of which is the Right or Left. But otherwise they're fine. Their ear buds. They work.
customer_reviews.author: JavaJnky

customer_reviews.title: Pink ear buds make listening fun, with great sound
customer_reviews.text: Just started using these today and it seems like the start of a love affair. The sound is crisp and clear. Used it with my kindle audio book and had a great listen.
customer_reviews.author: Notoriously Clever

customer_reviews.title: Add a volume control!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable ear buds. I get clear sound and mainly use then with my phone when doing my morning walks. The only thing I would change would be to put a volume control on the cords as I have to get my phone out to change the volume unlike other brands that have them on the ear cords so you don't have to find/dig for your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Janet B.

customer_reviews.title: Premium Sound indeed.
customer_reviews.text: It's surprising that at this low price one gets a premium sound and a convenient easy fit. I've tried half a dozen earbuds and this easily beats them. I actually have them on right now as I am writing this review, I can't believe the sound I am hearing from the album 'Sinatra on Sax' by Denis Solee. It makes the truism 'Music can alter your mood and make you happy' a reality with these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Artemio Layug

customer_reviews.title: You need to hear what you've been missing.
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried these ear buds, I was amazed at the performance and quality of this particular ear piece. It had brilliant, vibrant, sound for what seemed to be so small. The music had definition, pitch, and depth. And, the voices were clear.
customer_reviews.author: stephen crawford

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good earbud for the price. It fits well in the ear and has reasonably good sound quality. Snug fit provides sufficient noise isolation.
customer_reviews.author: OJFL

customer_reviews.title: The warranty is stupid. I have to package them up and ship ...
customer_reviews.text: so far ok. I had 2 pair go out on me. 1 pair not even a week. The warranty is stupid. I have to package them up and ship back at my expense and take a chance again on another pair shipped back to me. STUPID. Not worth the cost to ship back. Lesson learned dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Sanders

customer_reviews.title: The Best as always!
customer_reviews.text: The best!!! I have been buying this earbuds for years now I went through several generations and it's always great. they last me about a year but I use them constantly and for the price its great. this new one is even better, the sound is great, it looks awesome and what I love the most it completely shuts down external sound you only hear what you are listening to, on the other hand when you have them in your years the music is not heard outside no matter how loud you are listening to them, that's another plus. so for the price and not only, these are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: giorgi

customer_reviews.title: They sound awesome out of the package but then slowly digress until ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are as fragile as a 200 year old church stained glass window. They sound awesome out of the package but then slowly digress until one ear goes dead then the other ear suffers a slow death. Consider these very disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good phones
customer_reviews.text: The highs are more present than Ive ever heard. I actually can hear things and words behind the music that I never knew were there. My only complaint is that during the winter static electricity buils up and shocks my ears when I remove my jacket. Havent experienced this with other headphones before. Not a big deal tho. Nice bass!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Teenage son digs them
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me from hearing You Tube blared through a cell phone 24/7. He likes the style & color combinations. Also at the price point I won't be angry when they are lost or destroyed within a month.....if I'm lucky. Can't speak to the sound quality, but no complaints from the kid. JLABS are usually adequate to above average.
customer_reviews.author: Tim E 9691

customer_reviews.title: so good it will get you killed.
customer_reviews.text: very reliable never slips out my ear but have to be careful can't hear outside world with these things almost got hit by car.
customer_reviews.author: Rush

customer_reviews.title: Worked for less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: They worked for less than 3 months and have quit working. There is no visible sign of broken wires. I had hope that with a lifetime warranty we might get more than a few weeks of use out of them before they died.
customer_reviews.author: AT_ND

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY WILL BUY MORE
customer_reviews.text: These are great little buds with a very good sound - as good as the ones that came with my ROKU 4 that my cat chewed up. Great price. You don't need anything else and they arrived very quickly and well packaged. I think at this price I'll buy a few more just to have around for all my gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: wefishallday

customer_reviews.title: Good for every day life
customer_reviews.text: I love jlab they have really good products. But I had the jlab Diego earbuds. Loved them. These are good not as good bass, great highs, and comfort. SUPER LIGHT WEIGHT! But they feel cheaper in plastic. And their is a static noice sometimes if you move the jack. Comes with lots of different size ear pieces. Recommend for walking becuase you can kinda here out side but barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Rileyjmoreno

customer_reviews.title: ... finding earbuds that stay in my ears and aren’t painful. This is the second pair I have of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding earbuds that stay in my ears and aren’t painful. This is the second pair I have of these, just for the convenience. Perfect for running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic! I work in an open office (not even ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! I work in an open office (not even cubicles; our height-adjustable worktables are side-by-side), so it can be a bit distracting. These JBuds are very effective in reducing the noise so I can concentrate on my work and not be distracted. They fit very comfortably, too; I like the 45-degree bend as they seem to stay in my ears better. The sound quality is crisp, clear and full. These are the best that I've ever used. I may purchase another pair so I don't have to carry them to/from work each day and can have one pair for work and one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Rose in HB

customer_reviews.title: Headphone review
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of these based on brand and price alone. I just needed a basic pair of headphones for everyday use (walking around, gym, computer and etc.) They did the job but I noticed that the more I used it on my phone the more staticy it got. This was the case for both pairs I purchased. Not much noise cancellation tech, but okay sound performance. 5.5/10
customer_reviews.author: misterbuffkangaroo

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! Get you some!!
customer_reviews.text: I was going through earbuds like candy, about a pair a week until I got these with the 90 degree plug-in. I bought several pairs but not one has failed. I keep my phone in my front pocket and was breaking the wires on the straight plug-ins. The sound quality is also excellent. Mostly I listen to audiobooms while I work and these are just the best. I also like the fit in my ears, true left & right earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: DAN H GERKE

customer_reviews.title: They worked AMAZING until about a week ago
customer_reviews.text: They worked AMAZING until about a week ago, now only one side works! Wiggling the wire doesn’t help anymore either, the right side has completely gone out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ear buds.
customer_reviews.text: I love these earbuds. They are great sounding. They also fit my smallish ear holes and offer a variety of different tips. These work well on the plane and are comfortable enough to sleep in. I have bought many pairs of these, because my cat is the devil and tries to destroy them. Every pair has been wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: ProgJulie

customer_reviews.title: Reliable spare pair
customer_reviews.text: They sound like $10 earbuds. Never heard a complaint about the mic. Comes with a bunch of tips and detachable rubber fitment for securing the buds in the ears. They are very durable, somwhow. The right angled wire connection to the 3mm jack helps the wire from breaking at the weakest part. Overall it makes a good spare pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul Munshi

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my teen girls. I love how cushy the ear buds are. I have found many ear buds hurt my ear as they don't fit properly, these I wear for hours. They come conveniently marked L for left ear and R for right ear. The length is a little over 4 feet long so it fits in my back pocket with plenty of slack. Great price and may color to choose from. Picture- the one on the right side has been wrapped/personalized in bracelet cord.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Audio Jbuds
customer_reviews.text: The buds received were not what I that was being purchased. Returned without using so I cannot comment on quality of anything.
customer_reviews.author: Alex W.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than two months.
customer_reviews.text: A solid pair of earbuds while the lasted, which was less than two months. Now, any slight movement of the cable causes the right bud to drop the sound. The mic is hit or miss, sometimes the person on the other end could barely hear me. Note: The warranty is kind of a joke since you have pay postage to send and receive store credit. Disappointed in JLab with this one.
customer_reviews.author: A.Cal

customer_reviews.title: I love these ear buds!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness I love these! So far they have been the most durable ear buds I have purchased online! The plug in part has a great grip (saved my phone from hitting the floor when I would drop it out of my purse) and the sound quality it fantastic. 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Anja Keister

customer_reviews.title: Great! but...
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite brand of earbuds!! My only problem, is that they stop working after a few months. It's a little annoying to have to spend so much to replace them, but it's worth it to get their kind of quality.
customer_reviews.author: MJ  Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my headphones today and they seem broken. I've only used them once, and right when I started using them, the music quality was bad - the audio was broken like the wire was torn within. I'm not satisfied at all with this purchase and this brand is usually reliable​.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good For the Price; Not the Best
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had very good experiences with JLab before, as their earbuds used to be very high quality, but the cables on these seem to be getting thinner and thinner. I’ve never had a pair of this specific model last more than a year, but they sound decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Defective product, should sold to customers.
customer_reviews.text: The right earbud does not work due to loose wiring. Return has to be by tracking mail, which costs me may be only a couple of dollars less than what I paid for the earbuds. I prefer to take up the loss than take the trouble in returning. Frustrating why there was no quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph 965

customer_reviews.title: These are good headphones for your day to day use
customer_reviews.text: These are good headphones for your day to day use. The 90 degree jack is a big plus for phones with headphone jacks at the bottom of the phone, like my Galaxy S7. The multiple ear pieces that are included make it easy to find your fit. I have had no issues with the microphone or people having trouble hearing me while making calls. The inline mic does NOT have volume adjustment so look elsewhere if you need those features.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Unique look and great value
customer_reviews.text: They sound great and are very distinctive! JLab stuff is my go-to for reasonably priced audio, and these don't disappoint at all. Sound is clear, they're easy to find (thanks to my color choice), good quality. Thanks JLab!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A Barras Jr

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable earbuds
customer_reviews.text: They seem like you have to wiggle the connection a bit or the sound seems like it's not connected properly. They are extremely comfortable. I wish they worked better though.
customer_reviews.author: Debi LN

customer_reviews.title: Top value
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly deep and varied sound despite the small form factor and price! The little soft rubber wings really help keep the buds in place. I haven't ever used super high end ear buds, but these are more than useful for everyday uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best $10 earbuds on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best $10 earbuds I have ever used. Heck, they may be the best $20 earbuds I have ever used! Great and secure fit. Good bass and overall fidelity. That said, my $100 Bose earbuds are better, but sure would hope so!
customer_reviews.author: AZgman

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Great head earbuds. This company has something going for it. Good prices, Good product. The reason I gave only 4 stars was it took longer than expected to get to me. But i dont think it was their fault as it was the holidays and the US Postal service is ALWAYS behind or slow!
customer_reviews.author: BearsFan#1

customer_reviews.title: Great Earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my iPod earbuds, which are too large and uncomfortable for me. The smallest gel tips are perfect for my small ears. They are comfortable and stay in without rigorous movement. I used these for a few calls and the sound quality on both ends were great. I tried the Cush Fins for a couple of days but they made the earbuds too bulky to fit properly so I did away with them. The only slightly annoying thing is the lack of volume control but it's not a big deal for me. I would definitely buy these again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: David T

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality at Bargin Price.
customer_reviews.text: These JLab headphones offer very good quality for a affordable price ($7.99). The JBuds2 are solidly built and the sound is great for the price, though a little lean on bass. I burn through cheap headphones because I'm hard on my belongings and my cat, Rosie, likes to eat headphone cords. The JBud2 are now at the top of my list for good affordable headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy on he ears.
customer_reviews.text: Just received yesterday and used last night. Just what I needed to use in bed. I like to watch something that helps me take my mind off the problems of the day before I go to sleep. The bulky headphones I was using hurt my ear when I had my head on the pilolow. These are just right.
customer_reviews.author: seashoredot

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift simply because they matched my daughter's phone case. I won't even lie--I read none of the features. They were priced so great, I figured if they were mediocre, I could live with that. They are fantastic and way better than I expected. They fit so well, they block out external noise and all you hear is your music. We've gone through many sets of headphones because the cord cracks at the plug. This one has a 90 angle and so far that's not happening.
customer_reviews.author: Teena Fab

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality Is Undercut By Shoddy Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: These guys broke after two days - TWO!!! - of use. Right earbud stopped putting out sound. The claim on their website that you can just "throw them in your pocket" is clearly not true, since only two days of use putting it in my pocket and taking it out caused it to break. Honestly, I'm a little astounded: this is the shorted buy-to-break time of ANY earbuds I've ever bought. When they work, they sound great and don't fall out of your ear. Customer support was also speedy and helpful. But still -- two freaking days! Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Larson

customer_reviews.title: So far I like these alot
customer_reviews.text: So far I like these alot. They don'the fall out of my ear and are comfortable. I would like to search for these in a Bluetooth WI-FI version. These red ones continue to be a good product which is why I purchased the same ones in a different color. The upgraded ones were a problem but not these. Still doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Baird

customer_reviews.title: ... Jlabs products since around 2013 and I would definitely recommend this one
customer_reviews.text: Been using Jlabs products since around 2013 and I would definitely recommend this one... But if you are working out it may fall out your ears a couple of time if your ears are as big as mine
customer_reviews.author: Bossman

customer_reviews.title: Dead in Less than 2 Years
customer_reviews.text: It was the oddest death. One side started to lose sound, which was usual. However, it then started to drop calls / pause audio whenever the wire fell a certain way. I'm going back to Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: W. W. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Best ear buds out there.
customer_reviews.text: These ear buds have lasted me for 8 hours of use daily for the last year. I have had no issues and they have amazing clarity, fit and comfort. I can lay in bed on my side while they are in my ears and not have that uncomfortable cord issue. They are amazing. I have purchased many pairs.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeQueen

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other lower end Bluetooth earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: Good connection a long distance from my phone; better than any other Bluetooth earbuds I've used. Play time is also longer than any I've used. It is pretty good at covering up the blasting TV sound when I don't want to hear it.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: For all the hype, these are average ear buds at best. I even went through the exercise of the 40 hour burn in. The old adage you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best brand for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I used these and their Bluetooth version. They continue to excel in both device and audio quality. Won't ever go back to other brands! Highly recommend this product for everyone. And it is a good, inexpensive product for gaming not only on PC, but console as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Wear out quickly
customer_reviews.text: These work well as earbuds, mine gave out after a few months and for the price i think they should last longer. I can get dollar tree earbuds that last longer than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: 90 degree plug for laptops with side ports.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the 90 degree plug and it's perfect for laptops with side ports. Good fir for my ears, for what that's worth. Doesn't completely block all outside sound, but I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Barely Functioning
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with these earbuds. They randomly set off my phone's voice control, pause the music I'm listening to, or skip ahead in podcasts I'm listening to. The right side completely gave out after 2 months. If I move the jack, sometimes audio will give out. Very disappointed, since I've had several pairs of JLab earbuds that have lasted years before this.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: They are angled a bit so they fit (and stay put) in the eara better than other ear buds. I also prefer the "L" shaped plug in (less likely to get snagged than the standard "straight" plug in. )
customer_reviews.author: JENN

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE QUALITY. VERY CHEAP MADE.
customer_reviews.text: Worse earbuds I ever bought in my life. Very cheap quality. I wish I could get my money back. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, hold up well
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, sound is good. So far so good! So many ear buds seem to only last a short time. These are holding up well, and I like the fit into my ear, different from regular ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: A bummer
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even had them for 2 hours and the sound isn’t working on the left. I like the brand. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, what you'd expect for earbuds at this price; very comfortable, fit perfectly snug for me; the 90 degree angled plug definitely helps the wire integrity last longer so one of the earbuds doesn't start cutting out due to stress on the wire that a straight plug gets. Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.author: K.M

customer_reviews.title: I was a skull candy addict and these are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I am loving these headphones! I was a skull candy addict and these are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Renae Baker

customer_reviews.title: BEST FOR THE MONEY, BUT ONLY JUST
customer_reviews.text: The quality is really good, and the mic picks up my voice pretty well. The button has nice travel, and a solid click so you KNOW when you're clicking it. My only issue is that, the wire quality is poor, it broke easily under normal use (lasted like half a year?) and that I feel the fit in the ears was good but the plastic wore quickly in the earpiece area specifically.
customer_reviews.author: Ugean Albus Chaudhry

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds for electronic devices
customer_reviews.text: High quality earbuds with good clarity of sound. Great value for the price. I will not claim warranty as my grandaughter pulls them out of her ears hard & breaks the wire, the other parts are not damaged & are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: great sound quality and excellent product. My daughter is rough on ear buds and headphones, but these ear buds have stood up to her and are still in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: meggie's momma

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than two months
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good, but one of the earbuds stopped working after less than two months of light use. As a result, these are a poor value despite the good price.
customer_reviews.author: kaybee

customer_reviews.title: I would buy in these again.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these so I am happy with how they work. The only thing I dislike is that after about 9 months or so I have a little bit of issue with the headphones when plugged into my phone. However I feel that for the price I can deal with purchasing a new set when that starts happening.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: really enjoy how the shape of these earbuds fit in my ...
customer_reviews.text: really enjoy how the shape of these earbuds fit in my ears. The sound is good and I like that they do not have a mic as I do not use headphone for calls. I do wear them when running in weather and need to wear a winter cap and these fit nicely in the ear so they are comfortable with ears covered. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Schleuger

product_meta.title: JLab Audio JBuds Pro Signature Earbuds | Titanium 10mm Drivers | Music Controls, Universal Mic | Custom Fit with Cush Fins | Black
feature_bullets: PREMIUM SOUND QUALITY: These earbuds use 10 mm sound drivers to deliver full range audio with deep bass all in a compact size. The design of the JBuds Pro helps block out ambient sounds so that you can listen to your music/video’s comfortability in public places such as trains and buses.
ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT: Our Signature earbuds are designed with an improved ergonomic shape which offers extra comfort and a lightweight feel.

COMFORTABLE FIT: The earbuds fit perfectly in your ears and provide a comfortable listening experience you can use all day. 3 soft silicone gel tips provide a super comfortable, noise-reducing fit and 2 Cush Fins guarantee a perfect fit.

TAKE CONTROL: The JBuds Pro are built with and in-line remote and microphone, so you can control the volume, skip tracks, activate Siri, Google Assistant and answering or hanging up calls all without taking out your phone.

TWO YEAR WARRANTY/30 DAY GUARANTEE -We are so sure you’ll be happy with your purchase that we offer a “30-Day Money-Back Guarantee” to ensure customer satisfaction of our Jlab products. Also included with our products is a 2-year limited warranty to ensure you are covered for up to two years in case any issues with our products arise.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,040 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
